sentences.english: Allow plenty of time for this deceptively short journey.
sentences.chinese: 有大把时间享受这一短暂的迷幻之路。

sentences.english: Which then becomes a terrific hallucinogen.
sentences.chinese: 到时候就会变成一种可怕的迷幻剂。

sentences.english: And the use of cocaine, hallucinogens, steroids, and alcohol by America's youth are all on the decline.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因，迷幻药，类固醇和酒精的使用也前面下降。

sentences.english: Still later, the psychedelic explosion brought new controversy to the world of rock.
sentences.chinese: 更久之后，迷幻爆炸将更多的争论带入摇滚界。

sentences.english: We also did some Beatles covers and got to be kind of psychedelic.
sentences.chinese: 我们也做披头士的翻唱而那有点迷幻。

sentences.english: By some freak I was overpaid this month.

sentences.chinese: 迷幻药真的是神经毒吗？

sentences.english: The long psychedelic summer is over, the dreams continue.
sentences.chinese: 漫长迷幻的夏天已经过去了，梦还没有结束。

sentences.english: Guns that jammed under extreme pressure, and an extraordinary war chest of hallucinogens.
sentences.chinese: 枪在异常的压力下卡壳了，和一种强烈的迷幻药。

sentences.english: His friend advised him to take hallucinogens so he could be brave and courageous.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友们怂恿他服用迷幻剂去鼓起勇气表白。

sentences.english: It also produces amounts of the psychedelic chemical dimethyltryptamine.
sentences.chinese: 它也产生微量化学迷幻剂二甲基色胺。

sentences.english: The acid rock music also had negative effects on the plant growth.
sentences.chinese: 迷幻摇滚乐对植物的生长同样是负效应。

sentences.english: At nineteen, Otto discontinued his exploration of LSD.
sentences.chinese: 在19，奥托停止他的迷幻剂的探索。

sentences.english: Then add half a teaspoonful of strychnine.
sentences.chinese: 吃了一堆和士的宁混在一起的迷幻药？

sentences.english: Since then, the study of psychedelic psychotherapy has been limited.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，有关迷幻剂治疗法的研究也受到了限制。
